org.gearvrf.scene_objects

Class GVRViewSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRSceneObject
        • org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRViewSceneObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventReceiver, PrettyPrint, IScriptable

    public class GVRViewSceneObject
extends GVRSceneObject
    This class represents a Scene object that shows a View into the scene with an arbitrarily complex geometry. See GVRView

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRSceneObject

        GVRSceneObject.BoundingVolume, GVRSceneObject.ComponentVisitor, GVRSceneObject.SceneVisitor

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject

        GVRHybridObject.CleanupHandlerListManager, GVRHybridObject.NativeCleanupHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRView gvrView, float width, float height)
      Shows view in a 2D, rectangular scene object.
      GVRViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRView gvrView, GVRMesh mesh)
      Shows any view into the scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRViewSceneObject

        public GVRViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                          GVRView gvrView,
                          GVRMesh mesh)
        Shows any view into the scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrView - The GVRView to be shown.
        mesh - a GVRMesh - see GVRContext.loadMesh(org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource) and GVRContext.createQuad(float, float)

      • GVRViewSceneObject

        public GVRViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                          GVRView gvrView,
                          float width,
                          float height)
        Shows view in a 2D, rectangular scene object.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        gvrView - The GVRView to be shown.
        width - the rectangle's width
        height - the rectangle's height

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public GVRView getView()

      • lockCanvas

        public android.graphics.Canvas lockCanvas()
        Gets a Android Canvas for drawing into this Scene object. After drawing into the provided Android Canvas, the caller must invoke unlockCanvasAndPost(Canvas) to post the new contents to the scene object. See - Android Surface.lockCanvas(android.graphics.Rect)

      • unlockCanvasAndPost

        public void unlockCanvasAndPost(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Posts the new contents of the Android Canvas to the scene object and releases the Android Canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas previously obtained from lockCanvas() See - Android Surface.unlockCanvasAndPost(Canvas)
